channel.title: Help me please i cant change npc location and the new coords are right
channel.description:
hi i am using augeus Pkz! base to make my own server but i have came across a tricky problem, when i try to change the npc location so it goes to my new home area it doesn't work and they just stay where they are, this is annoying for me as i am trying to make my new home area look less blank
i have included some pictures wich should show you what i mean
sorry bout link format but dont know how to change
[img=http://img148.imageshack.us/img148/3715/npcsherewantedme4.th.png]
[img=http://img206.imageshack.us/img206/158/coordsnb8.png] By gs_pk_pure
[img=http://img354.imageshack.us/img354/5886/buttheyareheretl6.th.png]
[img=http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/4465/andhereey5.th.png]
heres my autospawn.cfg
[img=http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/179/myautospawncfgaf8.th.png]
please can some1 help add me on msn my addy is
tom_killer@hotmail.co.uk
or reply here your choice
